body_html:
There should always be a log somewhere when you get killed, unless you actually run out of memory.

Try setting the env var GLOG_logtostderr=1, and also look at dmesg to see if you have been sacrificed.
body_text:
There should always be a log somewhere when you get killed, unless you actually run out of memory.
Try setting the env var GLOG_logtostderr=1, and also look at dmesg to see if you have been sacrificed.
body:
There should always be a log somewhere when you get killed, unless you actually run out of memory.

Try setting the env var `GLOG_logtostderr=1`, and also look at `dmesg` to see if you have been sacrificed.
